characters.superpowers: solar energy absorption and healing factor, solar flare and heat vision, solar invulnerability, flight
characters.origin_description: He was born Kal-El on the planet Krypton, before being rocketed to Earth as an infant by his scientist father Jor-El, moments before Krypton's destruction.

Superhuman strength, agility, endurance, ability to stick to and climb walls and other surfaces, uses self-designed web-shooters allowing him to fire and swing from sticky webs, special "Spider-Sense" warns of incoming danger, genius intellect specializing in chemistry and invention.
He is a member of the intergalactic police force known as the Nova Corps, for which he gained superhuman abilities including enhanced strength, flight and resistance to injury.
